metadata.name: Relief
metadata.description:
The title of this artwork is RELIEF and This demonstrates a paradox. There are some countries that restrict women to cover themselves and wear hijab, but in this art although this woman is forced to wear hijab , she is looking for a relief.
As you can see in this art she has found this relief in painting her nails.
The light on the wall is shown lack of freedom and indicates the prison of mind.

_Oil on canvas
-This piece was published in LEONARDO magazine in SPAIN, 2022
